member.name: T:Microsoft.Uii.Common.ConfigurationValueReader
member.summary: Configuration Value reader helper class to read values from either the configuration file or the Configuration details object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.ConfigurationValueReader.ReadAppSettings(System.String)
member.summary: This method reads from the appSettings of the config file or the configuration web service.
member.param: The key to attempt to read.
member.returns: The value read from either the config or the web service

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.ConfigurationValueReader.ReadSection(System.String,System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler)
member.summary: This method reads from a specific section of the config file or the configuration web service.
member.param: The name of the section to attempt to read
member.exception: Thrown when no configuration is found from either the config file or the web service.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Configuration.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Configuration.Strings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Configuration.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.Configuration.Strings.COM0100_NOCONFIG
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Configuration settings not found for section = .
